text:
@xGolbezx What, Sword of Mana? I didn't really like it. It was way too easy and you always had to sit like every 5 seconds lol. It was also too "Mana" and not enough "Final Fantasy" like the original and Seiken Densetsu 3, what with the weapon upgrades and magic system.

I prefer FFA.
author: genesisSOC

text:
@YRAntiNoob There could've been some improvements, ESPECIALLY the A.I. 
But, despite that, it managed to be a damn amazing game :)

text: @shion255 I agree, This was one of my first Gba games when I was a kid and I thought it was the best game ever, so when I look back at it I can't see the faults of it over the nostalgia.

text: @YRAntiNoob agreed, the difficult and the stupid AI where the worst part of the game, the seeds, forging and "pokemon" elements it has were quite cool imo, also the class system it has  was a waste and the magic is equally bad, in short words it sucks in gameplay and excel in graphics and features
